meanings.definition: A person who dares or is bold
meanings.sent1: The darers in the group were always the first to try new things.
meanings.sent2: The brave darers stood up to the bullies at school.
meanings.sent3: The darers decided to dress up as superheroes for the costume party.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the darer of the office, always speaking up for what she believed in.
meanings.sent5: The image of the lone darer facing the dragon will forever be etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: Those who take risks or face challenges
meanings.sent1: The darers on the team volunteered to go on the dangerous mission.
meanings.sent2: In times of crisis, it's the darers who step up and lead the way.
meanings.sent3: The group of darers decided to climb the mountain just for fun.
meanings.sent4: She was one of the darers who signed up for the extreme sports competition.
meanings.sent5: The darers who ventured into the unknown forest came back with tales of bravery.
